synopsis.text: Makoto Tachibana and Haruka Nanase, two passionate swimmers, embark on a new journey as they enter Iwatobi Middle School. Haruka, with his unique connection to water, struggles to adapt to the changes that come with growing up, while Makoto fits in seamlessly. As they join the school's swim team, they are joined by new faces like Asahi Shiina and Ikuya Kirishima, each with their own goals and baggage. The boys strive to find harmony in their swimming styles and overcome their personal challenges, as they prepare for the medley relay competition. High Speed! -Free! Starting Days- captures the essence of their sparkling youth, their shared love for swimming, and their journey to become a cohesive team, all set against the backdrop of spring's blooming cherry blossoms.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
